reviewText:
I haven't any issues with the pbs thing playing. It jumps right in.

If you put this into your computer you have some CD-ROM aspects too like coloring pages and games.

You can play any episode first and it will play that and the subsequent episodes in order.

I have a screamer. He sits for this. I am a happy mom.

P.S. The Canadian way people in the video never say "yes" they say "ya". I'm American it's a bit annoying to me to hear my two-year-old yelling YA!
My son (3) loves Caillou and I bought this DVD as it was a nice price and if it is possible to wear a DVD out that will happen soon, good stories good value for money>
Calliou its great my daughter love's it and we do too  because it includes the whole family in his stories, along with good learning for kids and parents.
The new Caillou dvds are a little different from what we're used to.  They don't have the puppets in between the segments.  They are still great and the kids don't seem to mind.

There's a lot to praise about the Caillou series, but three things stand out especially in my mind. First: having myself three kids in or slightly past the age of Caillou (4) and his sister (2), I must say I have never seen video-stories so sensitive and accurate in portraying the mental world of the two age levels. The author is reported to be a children's psychology specialist, and it certainly shows.

The second point is related: the stories unfold in a wonderfully gentle, serene, every-day manner. They're in total contrast to the prevalent action-packed, slightly hysterical type of children's movies, yet somehow they're very powerful in drawing the audience into the little joys and pains of a kid's life.

Finally, though perhaps less uniquely: Mum and Dad are depicted in a refreshingly modern, realistic way which does more than just break the dualist Dad-as-career-hero, Mum-as-saintly-guardian stereotype. It shows them as people who sometimes want to have fun on their own, and who call in a nanny for the kids when they throw a party.
Fantastic for kids, with interactive games.  Great quality entertainment for kids.
Excited to have a show my daughter had for her little boy!  It will be #1 to have this.
Thank you outstanding product.
as advertised.
good
Caillou at his best
My Grandson loves Cailou - now he can watch it whenever he wants especially on long trips in the car!

Our 3 year old son who loves trucks, cars, and firetrucks, ambulances, etc. loves this Caillou. It is still second compared to the Winnie the Pooh movies (the new one and the Tigger movie) but it is nice to have another in the rotation for long car rides to visit family.

Until now, I've never had a single complaint about my near-perfect three year old. From sleeping through the night at 6 weeks of, giving up bottles and his crib and moving to his own room - even taking baths and going to bed every night without a single complaint and potty training and reading on his own at 2.

UNTIL CAILLOU.  And I'm not joking. This isn't a joke review. This is a serious complaint.

That obnoxious little brat, Caillou, in just two episodes, has my son WHINING "I can't!!" to EVERYTHING he is asked to do. "Time to get out of the tub, sweetie," I tell him. "I caaaaaaannnn't." He whines in this horrible squeal. I had NO IDEA where this abhorrent behavior came from until I caught THREE SECONDS of this horrible show on tv.

My won was watching intently and I said "turn the tv off please." And to my horror, he dropped to the floor, and started whining over and over "I can't!  I can't".

I wanted to throw up.  No shock- this horrible excuse for a television show has been PERMANENTLY banned from our home. I will tell every parent I know of this god -awful excuse for an "educational program".

My son has caught glimpses of sponge bob (crude), power rangers (physical fighting) and even half an hour of gremlins (not in my presence, but I found out he saw the most gruesome parts) and had ZERO reaction to these things - he didn't karate chop our house cats, or imitate any of the crude humor on sponge bob....but in a mere TWO MINUTES of "CAILLOU" my son immediately picked up that petulant little Bart's HORRIBLE incessant whine and his "I can't" crap that he spews every time he is asked or told to do ANYTHING.

In every episode after the first season, Caillou whines about EVERYTHING. He throws things, yells at his sister "Nooooooo, Rosie!" And whines CONSTANTLY. God forbid you should let your child watch this and then he or she starts sounding like Caillou. I'd rather my son dance around saying "Say Map!" All day than listening to him whine about EVERYTHING.

BY FAR the worst children's show I've ever seen.  PBS should be paying for a professional to help me fix this behavior (and a trip to the spa to relax my nerves after listening to the whining I'd never had to deal with before "CAILLOU". Flat out AWFUL.

Kayt
(Mom to one son, 3)
My kids love watching Caillou on PBS so I bought this DVD to play for them in the car.  They really like it, and it keeps them entertained especially on long car rides.
This Caillou has NO PUPPETS! My son Hates the ones with puppets! He wants to watch this dvd all day, everyday. Loves it!

If you like Caillou then this DVD is for you. my son is obsessed with him probably like everyone else and this DVD is on repeat that he already knows it by heart. mommy is already sick of it but it also gives me some time to get things done while this holds his attention..
perfect for road trips for my 20 mth year old child. He never wants to get out of the car
I GOT THIS FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER AND SHE LOVED IT SO MUCH I ALMOST COULDN'T GET HER AWAY FROM THE TV

I would have given this 5 stars if it weren't for the fact that these are all on tv already. I was hoping these were new shows that she hasn't seen at all, but they are not. I'm still glad to have them as we are making a 12 hour driving trip to the beach in a couple of months, so she will need several things to entertain her. This of course, she will love.
I really don't like the skits and puppets in between some of the older DVDs. This doesn't have any of skits or silly puppets. It's great and the episode selection is quite lovely.
This is a lovely DVD full of interesting Caillou stories that amuse and entertain (and teach) my 2 year-old grandaughter.

My 3yr old daughter loves Caillou. These episodes (same as shown on Sprout) show Caillou using good manners, going on fun adventures, and not whining (episodes shown on PBS Kids show a very whiney Caillou & I don't let my daughter watch those). There are no silly puppets on this DVD. I highly recommend this DVD as well as Caillou's Playschool Adventures and Caillou's Family Favorites.

My grandson watches this character more than any on tv.  Luckly, he isn't watching tv all day, but when he does, it is Calliou.  Wonderful program with very good lessons, my grandson wants to follow everything Calliou does, what a fantastic learning tool, move over Barney and Seasame Street.
Great buy! My son is obsessed with Caillou and has been watching this dvd everyday since we got it! This one does not have the puppets which my son wasn't too fond of.
Both of my kids (1 and 2) love this dvd.  My daughter can't get enough of it.  We received the dvd very quickly and it was in very good condition.
My son is 2 and this is the only show to hold his attention so I buy the DVD's whenever I find a deal.  Another plus is there are no puppets in between the episodes.
Bought this for very active two year old boy, and Caillou brings him to a stand still every time!  Product exactly as described!

My 22 month granddaughter just absolutely fell in love with Calliou from watching PBSKidsSprout! She can be in another room & hear just one or two notes of the theme song & lights up & says 'KY-YEE!' & runs in to watch it! She has the 'Everyday Hero'
DVD & I know pretty much every word to the whole thing! She has probably watched this thing over 100 times. I kid you not! AND, she's only had it a few months!!!
Thank goodness for a refreshing cartoon that is something you aren't afraid to let children watch! A few things are pretty absurd~him knowing how to talk THAT well & being able to do EVERYTHING he does. But, it is still something that I will always let her watch as long as she is interested. I just wish I could find the merchandise in stores without having to search the internet! At least the DVD's are in stores!!!
You can't go wrong with Calliou, er, KY-YEE!!! ;-)))
The grandchildren love watching this when we are driving around in the car. Makes long or short trips a breeze.
My 2 yr. old Loves watching Caillou and they run back to back for the entire length of the DVD.

If your child likes Cailou, he'll love this dvd. After reading all the reviews, I chose this over others since my 3 y/o has only seen the PBS shows without the puppet(s) mentioned. Since my little boy is all about heroes and firefighters, he has really enjoyed this.
we loves this caillou dvd. i just wish it didn't have the puppet segments going throughout the whole thing.

but that's fine.  My daughter (2-1/2) loves Caillou.  I've grown to enjoy some of the episodes, but I'm firmly convinced I've seen them all; every one ever made, that is.  This is a nice easy DVD for "getting ready for bed". My daughter has fallen asleep in front of it numerous times, which is virtually impossible with Elmo or Curious George.  We love the vid and anyone with a 2-3 year old will to.
My Grandson watches it over and over. I got it right away and it was packed nicely.

I bought this DVD because my son had become obsessed with "Caillou" and I was just taping it on the DVR everyday, but that's all he wanted to watch ALL the time....so I figured having this to put on in another room has helped wonders....I don't have to watch it all the time also.  I choose this one because it doesn't have the puppets in the middle of the regular cartoon parts because my son doesn't like those parts.  He loves it, highly recommend.  Wonderful DVD's that actually teach good manners and real life situations, much better than most cartoons on TV these days.
Love it
DVD ce perfect and played just fine. Would definitely buy again!
My girls love this DVD! We haven't stopped watching it in the car since we got it. Caillou is darling and has such good lessons for little kids. This is one show I don't mind my kids watching.
Great
Great find...loved this video
Item as listed & fast shipping.
My son loves caillou and he enjoys these episodes and watches them all the time.
Alena loved these dvds.  Helped her calm before night time.
Grandson loves no problems to report! Fast service although video a little low he still loves it. Thanks!
my son love it
